resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">Cendor Clegane, The Mountain. He is the eldest brother of Sandor Clegane, hated by him for burning half his face as a child. Knight, he is known to be one of Westeros' best fighters, extremely impulsive and violent. He is also nicknamed "the mad dog of Tywin Lannister", which is his sovereign since the house Clegane is a vassal house of the Lannisters.
resource.chars: Cendor Clegane, The Mountain. He is the eldest brother of Sandor Clegane, hated by him for burning half his face as a child. Knight, he is known to be one of Westeros' best fighters, extremely impulsive and violent. He is also nicknamed "the mad dog of Tywin Lannister", which is his sovereign since the house Clegane is a vassal house of the Lannisters.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">Ser Loras, the Knight of Flowers. He is the son of Lady Alerie Hightower and Lord Mace Tyrell, the Lord Paramount of the Reach and Warden of the South. Loras was raised in privilege in the family seat and regional capital of Highgarden of which he is the heir.
resource.chars: Ser Loras, the Knight of Flowers. He is the son of Lady Alerie Hightower and Lord Mace Tyrell, the Lord Paramount of the Reach and Warden of the South. Loras was raised in privilege in the family seat and regional capital of Highgarden of which he is the heir.
